data.actual_result: a click-able `https:///👌` without any thumbnail, or if you typed `https:/\/\👌`, a non-click-able `https://👌` without any thumbnail
data.short_description: Backslashes are replaced by normal slashes in URLs when used to escape an emoji. The link still works but won't display any thumbnail because of the additional slash.
